channel.title: Resurrected Kingdom >VPS HOSTED>WEBCLIENT>BLAST FURNACE LOT MORE!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://reskingdom.com/downloads/client/ban.png[/img]
Website/Forums: http://www.reskingdom.com Webclient/Play: http://www.reskingdom.com/play.html
Features: Fully working blast furnace! Cool custom PVP mode! Lots of cool bosses. All skills working! Clan chat with awsome features! Clan chat stays open when you are offline! :O Also able to rename it! Fully Working lootshare! Also able to give friends ranks! Amazing summoning!
Media: [img]http://reskingdom.com/downloads/client/blast.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fSAWKsREGP0[/youtube]
More media coming soon please join today! Brand new server released today currently looking for staff. Please do not beg this will not achieve you anything and will most likely hinder my decision.[/center]
